website_summaries.verdict: It’s difficult to beat this large assortment of easily swappable and functionally varied smartphone lenses for such a surprisingly low price. You couldn’t ask for a better smartphone photography kit for starters.
pros: Simple clip design fits most smartphones
Includes 198° fisheye lens, 15x macro lens, 0.63x wide angle lens, 2x telephoto lens, and CPL lens
cons: You may need to remove your smartphone case for the lens clip to fit your device properly

customer_reviews.title: ADD IS MISLEADING
customer_reviews.text: It does not work in iPhone X.. the add is misleading, tried to return but it did not allow it.. very dishonest!!
customer_reviews.author: L Miller MD

customer_reviews.title: The best phone camera lens set that I’ve ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: This was the best phone camera lens set that I’ve ever purchased. I was very skeptical buying these lenses because I love my DLSR and thought nothing would replace it. But I was wrong and don’t have to lug it along any more. These lenses do the job very well. I believe these are the future and DLSR cameras will be history soon. The lenses are made with optical glass and the frames are made of solid metal. The clip has a soft pad in the interior so it won’t scratch your phone. You can tell that this is a good quality product. I use the telephoto and the macro lenses the most. I love my Shuttermon lenses!
customer_reviews.author: docbrown007

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase! Great lenses great pictures!
customer_reviews.text: I’m actually very surprised with the quality of this lens kit. The lenses are made of a strong material and the pictures you get are simply amazing! I’m a designer and I needed something like this because I was fed up with my bulky camera. These lenses help me capture every detail for my customers and they fit perfectly in my pocket. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Nina Mihova

customer_reviews.title: Love the telephoto lens! Worth buy!
customer_reviews.text: We bought them before we went on vacation and we are more than satisfied with the results. We took stunning pictures, very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: gratiella pricop

customer_reviews.title: Complete and ready to go!
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I have bought lens for my phone. I love everything about them! The case to carry them in. That it has an attachment you can hang off a belt loop or your purse. The quality is good and so easy to attach and use. I am very happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Sandy L

customer_reviews.title: ... two days ago and I am in so much love with them
customer_reviews.text: I just got my lenses two days ago and I am in so much love with them. Before I had trouble trying to get the wide angle lens and macro lens apart but I did it and it was awesome. I read the reviews before buying this and a lot of them were about how the camera can catch the outline of the lenses and all that. Yet when I got my package it was nothing but awe and love. This also saved me from actually ordering a camera for my reunion trip. The product is accessible, affordable, and travel friendly. I highly recommend this if you want some simple yet exquisite (:
customer_reviews.author: Lannietta V.

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!  You cannot go wrong for the money.
customer_reviews.text: I have attached a snowflake picture using the CPL MOBILE PHONE LENS and an origami picture using the TELEPHOTO LENS. These are easy to attach and fun to use! I probably have taken 200 pictures around the house since these arrived a few days ago. I ordered 2 sets as gifts as well and I'm sure the recipients will enjoy them as I am. For reference, my phone is a LG L82VL by Straightalk. The lenses work best if I remove my hard case, but some of them work ok over it as well.
customer_reviews.author: DanicaW

customer_reviews.title: WORKS WELL !
customer_reviews.text: We bought one these lens kits recently for use with our iPhone X & Xs. I used the fish eye lens to photograph supercars at a Car show and it performed well. I haven't yet used any of the other supplied lenses but I'm sure I will. The lens kit appears to be good quality....metal threaded is impressive for the price. The soft touch carrying case is compact and comes with a clip which I used to attach to my jean's belt loop. Good product overall !
customer_reviews.author: FIGJAM

customer_reviews.title: Good quality lenses and indeed great quality pictures!
customer_reviews.text: From the moment you open the box, you know you’ve got a good quality product. The 5 lenses come in a nice, hard shell case to protect them from wear and to help you carry them around with you. You can easily attach it to your backpack, belt, pants, etc. I use all of them because they all have different features. I like how they fit on my iPhone 7 Plus even with my case on. My husband tried them on his iPhone X and they fit very well, also. A must have phone accessory! We bought two but we would probably need to buy one more for my daughter. I strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kit along with great customer service and follow-up
customer_reviews.text: I recently received the 5 in 1 lens kit. The lenses are packed quite nicely and snuggly in their case. They are individually marked so that the desired lens can be quickly placed in its receptacle. Each of the lenses fits nicely and easily. Although I have not had time to use the lenses extensively, they are an added enhancement to my phone. Of equal importance is the follow-up e-mail that customers will receive giving a detailed description and use of the lenses. The sellers promptly and courteously responded to my question when I e-mailed them. I think the lenses are a great buy for the price paid.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Polarization lens makes no fifference in photos but the other lenses are great
customer_reviews.text: I Loved the kit. Its organized and easy to use. The company immediately contacted me to see if I had issues. And sent an instruction video. The only issue I have, I purposely bought it for the polarization lens. My photos of glass jewelry still have a glare no different from when i dont use this lens!
customer_reviews.author: richard from nj

customer_reviews.title: Excelent camera lenses!
customer_reviews.text: We love this set of lenses! it works perfect with our iPhones7 and iPhone8. The customer service is also excellent. I contacted them to ask them how to focus the telephoto lens because I was a little confused and they answered me asap giving me more information about the lenses. Thank you for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Junk—Zero Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your time or money. The lenses don’t fit on the phone. The instructions were incorrect. It didn’t actually take good photos. In fact, all the photos were just bursts of blank images or like looking through a scope. Plus, all the parts are so tiny (and I have small hands and fingers) that you’re constantly dropping all the different pieces. Garbage. Would give zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Just got the product yesterday and I haven't had a chance to try it out yet.I like the zippered case the lens came in that is a great idea,keeps the lens together. I also like the lens caps so the lens don't have to be touched and leave fingerprints or accidentally getting dirt or other foreign debris on the lens.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my daughter. She is so creative with her lenses. Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are compatible with our devices and the pictures are so much better now. They come with clear instructions, nice hard shell and portable case for your convenience. The macro lens is so incredible to me, like a microscope. It gives you so much detail and the telescope lens does a great job with zooming, also. We really love our Shuttermoon lenses! A must have for every family
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: anyway he's very excited and so far very satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my brother which is a big photography enthusiast and as we all know the "regular cameras" are push out by the cell phones; anyway he's very excited and so far very satisfied with this product, very easy to use and can't wait to explore the art of photography with this useful tool . Very satisfied with the seller for processing my order so quickly as well
customer_reviews.author: Mima

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected! I love them!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know who invented this but this is a genial idea! I believe these lenses work even better than my DSLR and they are pocket size. How incredible is that?! Of course you need to learn how to use them correctly if you want to get the best of them. I googled it because I wasn’t getting the best of the macro lens and I found out that you have to get very close to the object in order to focus. All of the lenses work great. You can buy them with confidence!
customer_reviews.author: Denisa Muntean

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, Easy to Use, and Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: This little lenses are so simple to use and FUN!! My daughter opened the package and within minutes was taking really cool pics! So excited to have these and use them on an upcoming vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny F.

customer_reviews.title: This is a mini DSLR, indeed. Telephoto lens is just amazing, I can’t believe it’s real!
customer_reviews.text: Such high quality for the price, it seems incredible. At the beginning I didn’t know how to use them correctly and I thought I wasted my money but I contacted the seller and he explained to me how to use each one of them because I wasn’t using them correctly. After following his recommendation and playing a little more with them I figured out how they work. I would recommend them to anyone because they do a great job replacing the DSLR.
customer_reviews.author: Costea

customer_reviews.title: As described! Great starting kit.
customer_reviews.text: As described, definitely a good product. The only thing I dislike is if you have a case on your phone you have to take it off for the camera pieces to fit. I do like the product but I wish it could work on a thick case.
customer_reviews.author: KryDragonFyre

customer_reviews.title: Zoom Lens does a pretty good job with close-ups
customer_reviews.text: This is what you get: Zoom Lens does a pretty good job with close-ups. Wide Angle Lens does an awesome job if you know what pictures to take with it ( follow the additional instructions). Macro Lens does a good job with its microscopic features. Fisheye Lens is very interesting, it provides great distortion and you can use it for different sceneries and the Polaroid Lens reduces reflection as described, just rotate the lens until you see no reflection on the screen. I hope this helps!
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Gramada

customer_reviews.title: They arrived just in time and I’m very happy I purchased this brand because it’s really awesome
customer_reviews.text: I use them a lot for social media and family pictures. I really love this kit of lenses because they literally amaze me how great they work. Beautiful case and very good quality lenses.I would buy it again
customer_reviews.author: dd-us

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good looking box, nice hard shell case and great quality lenses! I’m a real estate agent and I need to shoot pictures every day. The five lenses help me capture every single detail for my customers. Love how they are enhancing the color and sharpness of the picture. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Alina Veja

customer_reviews.title: Fun lenses!My daughters love to play with them.
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a complete set of lenses because you get all that you need in one beautiful case.We bring it with us everywhere we go,actually I keep them attached at my backpack and use them every time we need to take pictures.A must have for everyone who owns a phone.
customer_reviews.author: medicuta  preda

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip to the Philippines and unfortunately it didn’t come in handy. The phones regular settings, zooming and filters worked out just fine. Besides the pieces falling out every time you open it
customer_reviews.author: Cedrick Lofton

customer_reviews.title: These 5 lenses are amazing! Clarity and sharpness as described!
customer_reviews.text: I get professional pictures without hiring a professional anymore. Love the quality of the lenses and the case is so fancy and easy to carry! Everyone can see the huge difference on my pictures. I’m fascinated with the fisheye lens and macro lens which I use the most. The clip fits well on my Samsung Galaxy. Worth buy!
customer_reviews.author: Samuil Bordea

customer_reviews.title: Stunning photos! The lenses look and work incredibly good! Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: I have so much fun playing with these lenses! The Fisheye is incredible, it gives a convex image and the picture looks so cool! The Macro Lens helps you capture every single detail like a microscope! So interesting! I would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: DESISLAVA

customer_reviews.title: Undecided
customer_reviews.text: I bought 4 of these, as my family and I are going to Europe on vacation in August. I cannot comment either way because we haven't used them yet! I gave 5 stars for value because the price was right! I gave only 1 star for ease of use because again, we haven't used them yet, and I won't know until August. If I can give another review after our vacation, I will! ☺
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Had all the advertised components nicely packaged, and the sellers helpfully sent a follow-up email with instructions for use. The clip will take some getting used to because the last phone-lens kit I had included a specialized phone case that the lens could screw into, but this looks like it will work fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my son. He has so much fun playing with these lenses; he got so creative with his photos! So glad we bought them!
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be very good quality. The case is so portable and easy to carry; you just need to attach it to your belt or purse. The clip is very well designed and made; it has a soft pad and it does not scratch your phone. The 5 lenses have different features and they really impact your pictures. Great accessory for our phones and tablets!
customer_reviews.author: Careful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Seems good, but it’s a present so I don’t know for sure
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good little product but haven’t heard a lot from the recipient
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far, the few lenses that I’ve use, it’s great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I use a Note 9, and these are total garbage. They don't focus well on anything, except the macro lense). If you want your pics to all be just slightly out of focus, then this lense set is for you!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas P Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great lens
customer_reviews.text: This is a pic of my cat's nose. The macro lens is super cool and works great with my Android.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste the money.
customer_reviews.text: This really did not do anything for my phone. I shouldn't have expected much for the price, but these did nothing. The macro didn't change anything, neither did the zoom or CPL. The fisheye sort of worked. The macro and wide angle are fused together and won't come apart so there is only 4 in this kit, not 5.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product. Works perfect with our iPhones! Wide Angle Lens gives you a wider view a lot better than your phone camera. Macro Lens enlarges the subject by 20X. telephoto brings you 4X closer to your subject. CPL does a great job reducing the reflection, keep rotating the lens until you obtain the desired results. Fisheye lens it’s fantastic, you will see. Better than advertised!
customer_reviews.author: andrey kehaiov

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t usually post a review. So far i am satisfied with the product. Express shipping (given that i am a prime user) . I’ll use the lens soon. :) and might give a better review about the lens itself.
customer_reviews.author: Katreena

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone 11
customer_reviews.text: It didn’t say iPhone 11 in the description, but thought I would try it. It’s already an awesome camera, but I was hoping to enhance it. Didn’t work! The first photo is the fisheye, second is the macro lens, third is the telescopic
customer_reviews.author: KayBay

customer_reviews.title: Very Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Great entry level lenses for those who want to give their photos and videos a little bit of an professional edge. Everything came as described. I think the price is definitely a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Dionté BOOM

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought the lens set as a gift, so did not use myself, but the recipient was very pleased. It made for an affordable but fun and interesting gift!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea O'Hearne

customer_reviews.title: High quality lenses
customer_reviews.text: I mainly bought this for the macro lens which is excellent. I really like the carrying case & keep it with me for when inspiration strikes.
customer_reviews.author: Jil Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I tried these lenses on the iPhone 6, 7, and X. All but one of the lenses would show a circle around the frame. They all did exactly what they said but I wish the lens opening was a little bigger! The carrying case was the perfect size and good quality! Great gift for teens!
customer_reviews.author: tvnvh

customer_reviews.title: A must have phone accessory!
customer_reviews.text: Happy with the quality of the lens kit. It is compatible with my phone, fun to play with, easy to use and to carry, and it will help you take incredible pictures. Satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Luiza Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So easy to use. Video stays clear.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with the wide angle that I wanted. No dark ring and the video remains clear.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Corwin

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff. It's great
customer_reviews.text: I used to use products of another brand, but their quality is far from as good as yours. Your products are in line with the high-quality products advertised. I am very glad that I have changed brands, I love this stuff. It's great
customer_reviews.author: Rene Larios

customer_reviews.title: I’m really happy with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like it because it’s easy to handle and because you get different kinds of pictures in just a blink. The quality is good and the price is excellent for a tool like this. I use it with iPhone 8 because no matter how good the quality of the iPhone camera is, it won’t have any of these features: (Macro, Fisheye etc).
customer_reviews.author: Alisa Dinita

customer_reviews.title: Good little lens kit - adds options to your phone's camera.
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are pretty good quality both the external casing and the lens themselves. The clip is easy to use and the metal lens screw casing is solid. I was able to take some decent fisheye, macro, and zoom shots; however, there was a problem because of my phone, not the lens kit. My phone has dual cameras in a raised bump; so it was a bit of struggle to keep the lens aligned - again not a problem with the kit. Just make sure to look at the camera lens on your phone and make sure the clip can sit flush.
customer_reviews.author: kfcee

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty happy with these lenses. The clip is well made too. I use it with an iPhone X in a Otterbox Symetry case and it clips on pretty well without having to take my phone out of its case. It probably won’t work with the larger otterbox case. I still give it 5 stars because it’s a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: dudemanbro

customer_reviews.title: however I just love it and came sooner than expected
customer_reviews.text: Its a bit weird to screw on the lenses. Still learning, however I just love it and came sooner than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Elsa F. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great seller!
customer_reviews.text: After first having a problem with the order, I posted a negative review. The seller promptly contacted me and sent a replacement. The lens fits my Samsung 5S which has a cover on it. I may need to remove the cover for a better fit. I'm satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Levato

customer_reviews.title: Enhance your creativity with your Phone Camera
customer_reviews.text: Your phone camera gets a lot to do with this. The macro one is very good; but you have to have a lot of patience to get a perfect picture.
customer_reviews.author: Mrityunjoy Nandi

customer_reviews.title: Great filters!!!
customer_reviews.text: The filters are great. I use them with iPhone X. I wasn’t sure that 2x zoom lens will do a such a great job, it’s pretty impressive for the price. My husband has tried a more expensive brand and it doesn’t do that good. Customer service is also excellent, you can buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: Adriana trohin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! Works over my phone case too! Wish there was a longer zoom lens though
customer_reviews.author: Heather A Smith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little lens kit, especially like the macro lens and the case.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Abel

customer_reviews.title: Great idea, easy to carry lens with little case
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Perfect for my husband who uses his phone for picture taking.
customer_reviews.author: sherry walker

customer_reviews.title: Nice with one exception
customer_reviews.text: Overall very pleased with the whole kit and carrying case is VERY convenient!! However the macro and wide angle lenses come stuck together and I had to use pliers to separate the lenses which resulted in the macro now having teethmarks and burs even though I used a piece of fabric to protect the lens during removal so macro lens not functional like this. The lens photos are nice for the price for sure!!!
customer_reviews.author: Robert C.Stivanson

customer_reviews.title: May not be your thing if you use a phone case.
customer_reviews.text: I have a case on my phone which causes the pictures to get a circle around them. It's a hassle to take the case off to take pictures. Concept is good if you don't use a case.
customer_reviews.author: Craig_C

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: These lenses are fantastic and I especially love the macro for capturing my tiny flowers! The telephoto is just a 2x, but it might come in handy on my trip. Fish eye will get used in cathedrals on my trip to Spain. Fits perfectly on my IPhone and IPad.
customer_reviews.author: Carol S.

customer_reviews.title: easy
customer_reviews.text: Great product and easy to use clip on and go
customer_reviews.author: Dona C

customer_reviews.title: My boyfriend loves this lens!
customer_reviews.text: We took a trip to Jamaica and he used this lens, the lens got wet and it just needed a few hours to dry and it still worked. the lens he used helped his camera take wider shots because with the lens things appeared farther away then they actually were given him a wider picture even though he was up close!
customer_reviews.author: Carlesa

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I like to take pictures normally and since I got a new phone I figured I’d try a lighter way of doing it then hauling around my big expensive camera. Although it doesn’t offer everything at a regular camera can it’s great for on the go light weight quick change if you get it on just write the effect is awesome. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Charli

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely amazing lens for phone!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a real estate agent and I needed something like this to help me fit more of a room in my pictures. This phone lens comes in handy because is very easy to carry around and very easy to use. The Wide Angle lens is sharp and does a great job, I love it because is not bulky like my other wide lens and it is more clear with no distortion. I also use the Telephoto Lens and Fisheye a lot. I am very satisfied and I recommend this lens kit. Absolutely amazing lens for phone! Stunning pictures, no distortion. High quality lenses at a decent price!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Circiu

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: The lenses are good quality, better than expected actually. I had to learn how to use them until I got the results I wanted, though. But they do a good job
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love these lenses and that they come with something to hold them all in. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for group selfies
customer_reviews.text: The wide angle lens is very useful for selfies with 5+ people. Fish eye + time-lapse video is a cool and funny combination.
customer_reviews.author: fbnx

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: Had to send them back. They are tiny and I'm not great with tiny things ( they came well presented in a case though). I couldn't tell a difference in most and in most cases my galaxy s7 photos were better without the lenses. The micro one is very cool though....it had great magnification. Return process was very simple and efficient.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Love it! Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, amazing soooo so amazing. I’ve had lenses for my phone before but nothing like these! They’re amazing, I love them so much and they’re highly recommendable. One thing I did notice though is if you have a case that protects your camera you have to 100% take it off if you want the best to come out in your pictures! Other then that, they’re amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rosslyn

customer_reviews.title: OnePlus 6
customer_reviews.text: The clip is large enough to place lenses even with the phone covers on. The small organizer kit is beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rafiul M.

customer_reviews.title: I am impressed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, exactly as described! Macro Lens and Wide Angle Lens come attached together, if you don’t read the manual you might get confused and believe that you are missing a lens. Definitely recomanded.
customer_reviews.author: edy631209

customer_reviews.title: East to use!
customer_reviews.text: I have enjoyed the many different lenses available in this package and the results I have gotten. Look forward to using them on my trip to Greece.
customer_reviews.author: L. W. LARSON

customer_reviews.title: Better than described
customer_reviews.text: Better than described! The mini DSLR does a great job actually.After understanding how they work, I managed to get amazing results. All I can say is that I am very impressed with the quality of the lenses and the pictures I get now are pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: greenbuilt

customer_reviews.title: Fun lenses
customer_reviews.text: These worked well for me and I have enjoyed having them just to play around with. They come in a nice little case that can be hooked on to a purse or belt loop. The macro lens gets super up-close and the fish-eye is a lot of fun. I do have to remove my phone cover when I want to use them, that's the only downside.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tetzlaff

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: It doesnt work very well with my Samsung galaxy S8. I am a little disappointed. Except for maybe the macro lens, everything else was not better than what my phone could do. I was excited to use the fish eye lens but it doesnt work with my phone with and with out the case and creates a circle in the photo.. It might be what others are looking for in it but definitely NOT what I was.
customer_reviews.author: Vrushali C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to help me get great pictures for my eBay listings. This is a big help!
customer_reviews.author: PKP

customer_reviews.title: All you need in one kit! Really cool!
customer_reviews.text: They came in a nice package and a nice case. The lenses are easy to install and easy to carry. Perfect accessory for my iPhone 6s. Love them all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Professional lenses, great for photos and videos. Very useful for my business!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a hair stylist and I advertise a lot on Facebook and Instagram. I honestly can’t thank God enough for these 5 lenses. They are very professional and saved me lots of money since they helpe do the job of a professional photographer. The lenses are good for any kind of pictures and I use them a lot for videos also. I don’t know what I would have done without the macro lens which captures every single detail of my work. And the Fisheye lens is simply amazing. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: angelica

customer_reviews.title: Don't order
customer_reviews.text: Don't even waste your time ordering doesn't work returned it .
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Hill

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the lenses! Cant wait to take all sorts of good shots
customer_reviews.author: Emily Cederstrand

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and unique!
customer_reviews.text: This product is so cool! The quality of the lenses Are very good. I liked the convenience of this product. You definitely get your money’s worth. The lenses really give you a good effect to your photos/videos. I do wish they’d stay in place a tiny bit better but i didn’t find it too much of an issue. My favorite is the wide angle lens to capture landscapes. Love that it comes in a sturdy, travel safe case and cleaning cloth. Took these with me on my vacation to Mexico!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very easy to bring with you (comes in a nice little zip container), and great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Solid performance from a great little on the go set!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little gadget! A friend had a similar one and I am always intrigued by his photos. Can't wait to get out there and really use it, but I did just get some amazing close ups of my daughter and her teammates at softball, using the telephoto lens. Parents were in awe of how clear, crisp and close I was able to get. I forsee a few of the ordering their own in the near future!
customer_reviews.author: Boston8147

customer_reviews.title: Can’t tell the difference
customer_reviews.text: Telescope is basically same. I can’t tell difference except fish eye and micro.
customer_reviews.author: Melody L

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit, but one of the lenses fell apart shortly after arriving.
customer_reviews.text: The case is nice. But the macro lens fell apart within 3 days after the item arrived, which was a bummer because it was one of the main reasons I bought this kit. I did not drop it at any point or improperly store it when it wasn’t in use. I don’t know how to put it back together. I’ve tried pushing the glass back in. I’m afraid if I try to glue it back together I will get glue on the lens, ruining it. Also for reference, I haven’t really used any of the other lenses so I don’t know how they will hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B

customer_reviews.title: ... quality and ease plus the carrying case is a nice way to protect and keep them organized
customer_reviews.text: I just used the lenses and was impressed with the quality and ease plus the carrying case is a nice way to protect and keep them organized!
customer_reviews.author: herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Great find!
customer_reviews.text: Love the detail of the product I ordered but unfortunately, one of the lenses came apart and was stuck briefly to the clip. I didn't return the item because I love the other lenses. Has been amazing to use at sporting events too.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey G.

customer_reviews.title: Not for catching wildlife in action
customer_reviews.text: Too many pieces make it cumbersome when I need a quick shot of nature. Difficult to position on my phone to get a clear picture. I would have returned it but I gave it time by repeatedly trying and watching the videos. Too late to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I decided not to bother using the lenses
customer_reviews.text: The difference in what you can capture with these lenses compared to the inconvenience of attaching them made them impractical for my use. So, I decided to just stick with the various features already available on my phone's camera.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Killer deal!
customer_reviews.text: Better quality than I had imagined, affordable , and everything works as it should ! Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice product and good quality for the price! Glad I don't need to carry my digital camera anymore. I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Tom

customer_reviews.title: Not bad just needed instructions
customer_reviews.text: This is just ok. The lenses have good picture quality but I was bummed that I couldn’t tell when lens was which from the manual that came with it. Also, be careful because the lenses are small and I lost one right away!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This product is just what I was looking for at ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is just what I was looking for at an affordable price. I am practicing with all lens and will be purchasing more for gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Glover

customer_reviews.title: When my friend recommended me this brand I was skeptical at the beginning ...
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many brands of lenses before but none of them worked. When my friend recommended me this brand I was skeptical at the beginning until I saw her pictures on Instagram. Now I can recommend it to anyone because I tried them and I’m very happy with the results. The quality is just very superior to other lenses that I have tried so far. I would buy it again . Beyond my expectations. The telephoto lens is incredible Strongly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: F X V T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lenses and carrying case
customer_reviews.text: Love these lenses! I’ve taken some great close up photos on my phone! For 10$ you can’t beat it.. I was about to spend the 100$ at apple for the macro lens they sell, glad I waited
customer_reviews.author: Joshin_yah

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Pretty basic. Comes in a nice little case with a clip for lanyard, purse, belt loop, etc.
customer_reviews.author: LISA ZEMPEL

customer_reviews.title: Real Mini Camera Lenses
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wide lens for a specific picture and my husband suggested these. I couldn't believe that they were real mini camera lenses for my cell phone. The picture turned out great and the lenses were very easy to install. Would definitely recommend for the value!
customer_reviews.author: Heather R.

customer_reviews.title: It works ok
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this, I never worked with or even heard of a macro lens before. But I figured for $18 i may as well try it. The case came with 4 lenses, no instructions at all. The macro lens you practically had to be right on top of the object and I really didn't notice any difference with the telephoto lens. But the macro lens was pretty cool. I just wish there were some instructions.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Trouble free purchasing experience.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 as gifts. Was a little surprised when they arrived as they were much smaller than how I envisioned them from the pictures. However, they made perfect stocking stuffers. Will update my review once I have heard back from the recipients on how well they perform.
customer_reviews.author: Dale R Swain

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to use and easy to carry around. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Does exactly what it says
customer_reviews.text: Not exactly what I anticipated. Reading again what was listed, it is what I received. I misinterpreted it the first time I read it. Don't know how much I will actually use it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat G

customer_reviews.title: Will try again and give review
customer_reviews.text: I can't seem to get them on there right. I'll need to try again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

product_meta.title: SHUTTERMOON UPGRADED Phone Camera Lens Kit for iPhone 11/Xs/R/X/8/7/6s/Smartphones/Pixel/Samsung/Android Phones Camera. 2xTele Lens Zoom Lens+Fisheye Lens+Super Wide Angle Lens&Macro Lens+CPL (5 in 1)
feature_bullets: 【PRO LENS QUALITY MATERIALS FOR FILM & PHOTO】Our engineers worked hard to come out with a perfect upgrade: premium grade metal not cheap plastic, multi elements, multi groups, not like other lenses with 1 group/1 element because we believe in quality not quantity.【SCROLL DOWN FOR MORE VIDEOS!】We multi-coated the lenses with premium optical glass to minimize reflections, ghosting, and other artifacts.【NO MORE DARK CORNERS!】Wide & Macro attached now for perfect clarity. 【NO MORE BLURRY PICTURES】!

【COMPATIBLE CLIP DESIGN - ANTI SLIP & ANTI SCRATCH】makes the clip firm and secured to your device while preventing scratches. Our clip is universal which makes it compatible with most mobile phones: iPhones (any type), Samsung (any type), iPad, Google etc. A great phone accessory, with a very easy to carry portable case. You will get a complete camera lens kit for travel shots, detail pictures, close-ups, birthday photos, Instagram, weddings, vacations, teens gift, etc. So much fun!

【BETTER FEATURES THAN THE MAJORITY OF THE LENSE】Our 198 ° Fisheye Lens has a much wider range than the 180° lenses offered in other lens sets, while our 15X Macro Lens provides 5X times greater depth than ordinary lenses and 0.63X Wide Angle Lens provides much less distortion than the common 0.65X lenses included in most kits.【VIDEO TUTORIAL】included in your package and【ADDITIONAL INSTRUCTIONS】will be sent to you one day after delivery unless you signed up not to receive unsolicited emails.

【BEST GIFT FOR EVERYONE】Who doesn't like pictures? We provide the creative tools to launch anyone into the world of Photography. The 2X Telephoto zooming lens will give you the opportunity to capture distant objects, allowing you to attain real impact into your shots. The 198° degree Fisheye Lens will help you capture convex, hemispherical images instead of square ones, giving you the fishbowl effect. With the 0.63X Wide Angle Lens you can capture the entire field or tribe in one picture.

【1 YEAR MONEY BACK - 2 YEAR WARRANTY - LIFE TIME ASSISTANCE】If for some reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, please reach out to us. Contact us if you didn't receive the email with our additional instructions of use so we can send them to you as soon as possible.With a simple "Add To Cart" YOU CAN TRANSFORM ORDINARY PICTURES into professional ones and create unforgettable memories for life. Be aware of fakes, Shuttermoon is the only authorized store to sell our products.
